channel.title: TetronCraft (Factions, MMO, Shops) (24/7, 100 slots, NO LAG!)
channel.description:
[center][b]TetronCraft[/b][/center] [center]We are a MineCraft 1.2.3 survival server! We are always online. Just hop online and start mining![/center] [ul][li]24/7 up-time! No worries that the server is down, you'll always be able to play[/li] [li]100 slots, we expect to grow![/li] [li]No lag! We're on state-of-the-art hardware paired with a state-of-the-art connection (2x Intel i7 15Mb cache @ 3.8Ghz, 4x 4GB DDR3 RAM (16GB total) @ 1666Mhz, 12Gbps SSD, 1Gbps line)[/li] [li]Create and join factions! Factions are like clans; they can claim land from the world. With factions, you won't be griefed![/li] [li]MMO; train up skills in an entertaining way... then put your skills to work![/li] [li]Money system with shops! Buy, sell, and kill for money! Use the money to claim land and buy items![/li] [li]Dedicated 24/7 TeamSpeak 3 server! Talk to your friends, maybe even get your own channel![/li] [li]Creative plot world! Never fear of griefing![/li] [li]And last but not least, you get an all-around fun time with our server! [img]http://static.minecraftforum.net/public/style_emoticons/default/wink.gif[/img][/li][/ul]
[center]
[b]Minecraft IP:[/b] play.tetroncraft.com[/center] [center][b]TeamSpeak IP:[/b] ts.tetroncraft.com
Apply for builder:[/center] [code]Username: Can you chat on TeamSpeak: What you can help build:[/code]
[center][b]Support us![/b][/center]
[center]We have a supporters signature:[/center] [center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/26438996/signature.png[/img][/center]

item.title: TetronCraft (Factions, MMO, Shops) (24/7, 100 slots, NO LAG!)
item.dc:creator: @Arcalamus Arcalamus
item.description:
@Arcalamus wrote:

[center]TetronCraft[/center]
[center]We are a MineCraft 1.2.3 survival server!
We are always online. Just hop online and start mining![/center]
[ul][li]24/7 up-time! No worries that the server is down, you’ll always be able to play[/li]
[li]100 slots, we expect to grow![/li]
[li]No lag! We’re on state-of-the-art hardware paired with a state-of-the-art connection (2x Intel i7 15Mb cache @ 3.8Ghz, 4x 4GB DDR3 RAM (16GB total) @ 1666Mhz, 12Gbps SSD, 1Gbps line)[/li]
[li]Create and join factions! Factions are like clans; they can claim land from the world. With factions, you won’t be griefed![/li]
[li]MMO; train up skills in an entertaining way… then put your skills to work![/li]
[li]Money system with shops! Buy, sell, and kill for money! Use the money to claim land and buy items![/li]
[li]Dedicated 24/7 TeamSpeak 3 server! Talk to your friends, maybe even get your own channel![/li]
[li]Creative plot world! Never fear of griefing![/li]
[li]And last but not least, you get an all-around fun time with our server! [/li][/ul]

[center]

Minecraft IP: play.tetroncraft.com[/center]
[center]TeamSpeak IP: ts.tetroncraft.com

Apply for builder:[/center]
